name: Demon Hunter (itch) (aerial301)
description:
A small game made for the 9 days 2023 Juice Jam II: PAYING THE PRICE

You are seeking to join the Demon Hunters guild, but to do so, you have to pay a high price and prove yourself as a competent demon hunter. Roam the wilds, slay demons, and collect enough coins to pay the price of the DH's membership card.

Controls:

- WASD / ZQSD : Move

- Left mouse button : Attack

- 1, 2, 3 : Select weapon

- Esc : Pause / Unpause
